item.title: Whats wrong here?
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

on this code:

							if (npcs[i].npcType == 2697) {
temp.killedCorp += 1;
temp.bossKills += 1;
temp.sM("Corp beast kills: "+temp.killedCorp)"");
temp.sM("Boss kills: "temp.bossKills+"");
							}

you missed a + sign and added an aditional ) lol…

here:

							if (npcs[i].npcType == 2697) {
temp.killedCorp += 1;
temp.bossKills += 1;
temp.sM("Corp beast kills: "+temp.killedCorp);
temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills);
							}

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong here?
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i get these errors for a code i added

:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07 :: Results: NPCHandler.java:3863: ';' expected temp.sM("Corp beast kills: "+temp.killedCorp)""); ^ NPCHandler.java:3864: ')' expected temp.sM("Boss kills: "temp.bossKills+""); ^ NPCHandler.java:3864: illegal start of expression temp.sM("Boss kills: "temp.bossKills+""); ^ NPCHandler.java:3864: ';' expected temp.sM("Boss kills: "temp.bossKills+""); ^ 4 errors :: Done! Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .
heres the code

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2697) { temp.killedCorp += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Corp beast kills: "+temp.killedCorp)""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "temp.bossKills+""); }
and the code above that

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2693) { temp.killedJack += 1; temp.bossKills += 1; temp.sM("Jack frost kills: "+temp.killedJack+""); temp.sM("Boss kills: "+temp.bossKills+""); }
what is wrong with the corp beast code?

Read full topic
